mapper.select: SELECT lm.id ,lm.sequence ,lm.stnd_date ,lm.item_code ,cc.dtl_code_name AS itemName ,lm.note ,lm.income ,lm.expenditure ,lm.balance FROM ledger_master lm LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code cc ON cc.div_code = 'LEDGER01' AND lm.item_code = cc.dtl_code WHERE DATE_FORMAT(lm.stnd_date, '%Y-%m') = #{date} ORDER BY lm.stnd_date, sequence ASC
